actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce discharged in House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Rereferred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for uniform standards for trucks carrying freight in interstate commerce, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe uniform standards for trucks carrying freight in interstate commerce and to prescribe standards for State taxation and regulation of such trucks. Reduces Federal-aid highway funding for States which do not comply with such standards.

titles.title: A bill to provide for uniform standards for trucks carrying freight in interstate commerce, and for other purposes.
